casebody.data:
Wayne PRATER, Appellant
v.
PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, et. al., Appellees No. 9 EAP 2018 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. November 21, 2018 Wayne Prater, Houtzdale, PA 16698-1000, Pro Se Appellant. Theron Richard Perez, Joseph G. Fulginiti, Pennsylvania Department of Corrections, 1920 Technology Pkwy., Mechanicsburg, PA 17050-8507, for Pennsylvania Department of Corrections, Appellee.

ORDER

PER CURIAM

AND NOW, this 21 st day of November, 2018, the order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED .
